title: 5 - T206 HOF  Cards - low grade - all SGC - SOLD

posts.post_title: 5 - T206 HOF  Cards - low grade - all SGC - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I am looking to sell the following 5 - T206 Hall of Fame cards as one lot.  Asking $275 postage paid/insured.  PayPal preferred.  Please email any questions to [url]dmjthomps913@att.net[/url]

Breshnahan with bat - SGC 20

Bender portrait - SGC 20

Bender with trees - SGC 30

Marquard Follow Through- SGC 30

mcGraw Glove at hip - SGC 20 

All with Piedmont or Sweet Cap backs

Thanks,
Dave
